about-me.paragraph1: Hi, my name is Barbara! I'm a Frontend Developer with a background in Industrial Design, which gave me a unique insight into human-centered design. I always think about how people will use my products and the experiences I want them to have.
about-me.paragraph2: I discovered my passion for web development at Henry's bootcamp, where I learned the technical foundations that I apply to my projects today. This experience led me to redirect my studies toward app development, deepening my knowledge in programming and applied design.
about-me.paragraph3: I'm currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science Applied to Multimedia and Website Design, which will allow me to continue growing in the field of web development and digital design.
